import React, { useState } from "react"; function ControlledInputs() { const [username, setUserName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [people, setPeople] = useState([]); return (
setUserName(e.target.value)} placeholder="iamtheuser" autoFocus />
setEmail(e.target.value)} placeholder="example@abc.com" />
    ); } export default ControlledInputs;
